text: Goodou hai gi iloo bolo ma ko Au, go Tagi go Yihowah, Au e hai baahi adu gi goodou, ge guu hai di hagadaumee ni goodou. Au ga daa mai agu siibi gi daha mo goodou, gei goodou ga hagalee hai nia hagaloohi ni digaula, gei goodou ga deemee hogi di madamada humalia i goodou. Au ga laha mai agu siibi gi daha mo goodou, gi dee mee di gai go goodou.
